item.title: 拥有两个世纪历史的银行的新老板颠覆了巴西金融业
item.description:
长期以来，该国的银行业务一直由富有的白人男性主导。塔西安娜-梅德罗斯（Tarciana Medeiros）有一个改变这种状况的计划。【原文：

The country’s banking business has long been dominated by wealthy White men. Tarciana Medeiros has a plan to change that.

】

item.title: 两家中国人工智能芯片制造商寻求上市挑战英伟达
item.description: 中国两家最著名的人工智能芯片设计公司正计划最快于今年在上海进行首次公开募股，以利用国内企业不断增长的需求，挑战英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Two of China’s most prominent designers of AI chips are targeting initial public offerings in Shanghai as soon as this year, taking advantage of growing appetite for domestic players seeking to challenge Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 迪纳波利表示，纽约市公交资本升级面临 270 亿美元的缺口
item.description: 根据纽约州主计长的一份报告，全美最大的公共交通系统在其下一个资本预算中可能面临着 270 亿美元的资金缺口，而这一预算将用于更换数千辆轨道车辆、加强系统抵御极端天气的能力以及提高交通便利性。【原文：The nation’s largest mass-transit system faces a potential $27 billion funding gap in its next capital budget that would replace thousands of rail cars, strengthen the system against extreme weather and increase accessibility, according to a report from New York’s comptroller.】

item.title: 英国预测师警告公共债务到 2070 年代中期将增加近三倍
item.description: 英国官方预测机构警告说，由于公共财政受到医疗保健和利息成本飙升的冲击，政府债务将在 50 年内增加近两倍，超过国内生产总值的 270%。【原文：The UK’s official forecaster warned that government debt will nearly triple to over 270% of GDP in 50 years, as the public finances are battered by soaring health care and interest costs.】

item.title: 施普林格-自然》启动法兰克福首次公开募股，再次推进上市进程
item.description: 由私募股权投资支持的学术出版商施普林格-自然公司正计划在法兰克福进行首次公开募股，这将是该公司今年下半年在欧洲的首次大规模上市。【原文：Springer Nature, the private equity-backed academic publisher, is planning an initial public offering in Frankfurt in what would be the first sizable listing in Europe for the second half of the year.】

item.title: 分析师称德国商业银行可能只是欧洲银行并购的开始
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A possible Commerzbank AG takeover by UniCredit SpA may be the trigger for more M&A in European banking, which would boost stock valuations for lenders seen as takeover targets, according to analysts at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 通用磨坊正在洽谈以 20 亿美元出售北美酸奶业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，通用磨坊公司（General Mills Inc.【原文：General Mills Inc. is in advanced talks to sell its North American yogurt business for more than $2 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 上周外资抛售日本股票数量创年内之最
item.description: 日本交易所集团（Japan Exchange Group）的数据显示，上周外国投资者抛售了 8240 亿日元（合 57.8 亿美元）的日本股票现货，创下近一年来最大的净抛售量。【原文：Foreign investors offloaded ¥824 billion ($5.78 billion) of cash Japanese equities last week, their biggest selling on a net basis in almost a year, data from Japan Exchange Group showed.】

item.title: 据说香奈儿所有者和欧莱雅继承人将投资奥尔森家族的 The Row
item.description: 奢侈品牌香奈儿（Chanel）背后的家族和欧莱雅（L'Oreal）的亿万女继承人收购了奥尔森双胞胎创立的时尚品牌 The Row 的股份。【原文：The family behind luxury brand Chanel and the billionaire heiress of L’Oreal have bought a stake in the fashion label The Row, founded by the Olsen twins.】

item.title: Altice 有担保债权人准备好债务谈判反提案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，包括贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.）、艾略特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）和太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Secured creditors of Altice France including BlackRock Inc., Elliott Investment Management and Pacific Investment Management Co. are readying a counterproposal to the company’s plan to reduce its €24.4 billion ($26.9 billion) debt pile, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国最快将于 9 月下调 5 万亿美元抵押贷款利率
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国准备最早于本月下调逾 5 万亿美元未偿还抵押贷款的利率，以加快降低数百万家庭的借贷成本，刺激消费。【原文：China is poised to cut interest rates on more than $5 trillion of outstanding mortgages as early as this month, according to people familiar with the matter, as it accelerates a move to reduce the borrowing costs for millions of families to spur consumption.】

item.title: 亚当-托兹谈对中国经济的重大误解
item.description:
我们真的应该谈论产能过剩吗？【原文：

Should we really be talking about excess capacity?

】

item.title: 国际能源署称：随着中国经济降温，世界石油需求增速为大流行病以来最慢
item.description: 国际能源机构称，随着中国经济降温，全球石油需求增长 "急剧放缓"，从而将价格推至三年来的最低点。【原文：Global oil demand growth is “slowing sharply” as China’s economy cools, pushing prices to a three-year low, the International Energy Agency said.】

item.title: 东京首次利用海外投资者发行环境债券
item.description: 世界上最大的城市之一正求助于国际投资者，通过发行开创性的债券为环境目标提供资金。【原文：One of the world’s largest cities is turning to international investors to fund environmental objectives in a pioneering bond issuance.】

item.title: 美国进出口银行有意投资莫桑比克另一个液化天然气项目
item.description: 美国进出口银行正在考虑为埃尼公司（Eni SpA）牵头的莫桑比克沿海液化天然气项目提供资金，而在此之前，埃尼公司已经投资了一个生产液化天然气的陆上设施，但该项目因安全问题和环保组织的反对而被推迟。【原文：The US Export-Import Bank is considering funding a liquefied natural gas project led by Eni SpA off the coast of Mozambique, years after investing in an onshore facility to produce the fuel that’s been delayed by security issues and opposed by environmental groups.】

item.title: 中国股市大跌将基准股价推至 2019 年初以来最低点
item.description: 中国股市跌至2019年1月以来的最低点，这严峻地反映出投资者对中国的盈利和经济复苏已失去信心。【原文：Chinese stocks fell to the lowest since January 2019, a grim reflection of how investors have lost faith over a recovery in the country’s earnings and economy.】

item.title: 欧洲汽车制造商股价每况愈下
item.description: 投资者认为欧洲汽车制造商的前景黯淡，而现实正逐渐证明比预期的还要糟糕。【原文：Investors have priced European carmakers for a gloomy outlook, and the reality is slowly proving to be even worse than expected.】

item.title: 韩国力争在三月结束对所有股票的卖空禁令
item.description: 韩国最高金融监管机构表示，它计划在 3 月底取消卖空禁令，并将确保届时必要的规则修订到位。【原文：South Korea’s top financial regulator said it plans to lift the ban on short selling at the end of March and will ensure that necessary rule revisions are in place by then.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国内美元债券销售成功后奈拉跳涨
item.description: 在西非国家宣布其首次发行的国内美元债券吸引了大量需求之后，尼日利亚的奈拉获得了近两个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：Nigeria’s naira gained the most in almost two months after the West African nation announced that its debut domestic dollar-bond issue attracted significant demand.】

item.title: NEXTDC 寻求 29 亿澳元贷款以扩展亚洲数据中心
item.description: 澳大利亚数据中心运营商 NEXTDC Ltd. 正在寻求银行提供 29 亿澳元（19 亿美元）的银团贷款，以扩大其在亚洲的业务。【原文：NEXTDC Ltd., an Australian data-center operator, is seeking a A$2.9 billion ($1.9 billion) syndicated loan from banks to expand its operations in Asia.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克公司称 mRNA 流感疫苗有望促进产品线发展
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）的实验性 mRNA 流感疫苗在一项中期试验中显示出对两种关键类型流感病毒的积极免疫反应，从而使该制药商在将该技术用于季节性流感疫苗的竞争中保持领先地位。【原文：GSK Plc’s experimental mRNA flu vaccine showed a positive immune response against two key types of flu viruses in a mid-stage trial, keeping the drugmaker in the race to bring the technology to seasonal influenza shots.】

item.title: 乌克兰过境担忧暂时缓解，欧洲天然气下滑
item.description: 周四，欧洲天然气价格下跌，原因是过境乌克兰的俄罗斯燃料将以正常水平流动，从而缓解了对供应可能下降的担忧。【原文：European natural gas prices declined on Thursday after Russian fuel transiting Ukraine was set to flow at normal levels, easing worries about a possible drop in supply.】

item.title: 尼日利亚顶级银行利率飙升，利润创历史新高
item.description: 尼日利亚市值最大的银行--担保信托控股公司（Guaranty Trust Holding Co.【原文：Guaranty Trust Holding Co., Nigeria’s biggest bank by market value, posted its biggest first-half profit as income from loans soared on the back of record interest rates.】

item.title: 贝莱德与合作伙伴联手推出私人市场零售产品
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. and Partners Group Holding AG are teaming up to offer retail investors access to a variety of private markets, seeking to tap into rising demand for alternative investments.】

item.title: 锂世界问：矿山意外关闭能否阻止经济下滑？
item.description: 中国最大的锂矿之一出人意料地停产，这让业内人士争相判断此举是否足以结束电池材料价格的长期低迷。【原文：An unexpected shutdown at one of China’s biggest lithium mines has left the industry scrambling to judge if the move will be enough to end the battery material’s prolonged price slump.】

item.title: 约翰-刘易斯减少损失，Waitrose 从 IT 故障中恢复过来
item.description: 约翰-刘易斯合伙公司（John Lewis Partnership Plc）在莎伦-怀特（Sharon White）向新任董事长交接工作前的最后一组财报中，因其高档杂货连锁店 Waitrose 的销售回升而收窄了亏损。【原文：John Lewis Partnership Plc narrowed losses as sales recovered at its upmarket grocery chain Waitrose, in the last set of results before Sharon White hands over the reins to a new chairman.】

item.title: 中国太阳能产能过剩迫使更多企业重组
item.description: 随着该行业面临大规模产能过剩和亏损加剧，越来越多的中国太阳能企业最终走上法庭。【原文：More Chinese solar companies are ending up in court as the industry contends with massive overcapacity and deepening losses.】

item.title: 瑞典通胀放缓提升瑞典央行宽松前景
item.description: 瑞典的通胀率在 8 月份进一步低于瑞典央行的目标，这增加了官员们加快宽松政策以援助萎靡不振的经济的可能性。【原文：Sweden’s inflation rate fell further from the Riksbank’s target in August, increasing the likelihood that officials will speed up an easing campaign to aid a sputtering economy.】

item.title: 台新对新光合并计划充满信心，但认为道路更加艰难
item.description: 台湾台新金融控股公司（Taishin Financial Holding Co.【原文：Taiwan’s Taishin Financial Holding Co. is confident of gaining shareholders’ approval for a takeover of Shin Kong Financial Holding Co. after raising its offer closer to the bid of rival suitor CTBC Financial Holding Co.】

item.title: 欧洲央行利率决议前欧洲股市上涨
item.description: 欧洲股市上涨，因为交易商的注意力转向了欧洲中央银行今天的利率决定。【原文：European stocks gained as traders’ attention turns to the European Central Bank’s decision today on interest rates.】
